snippet.textDisplay:
Translation:

Every time I meet her
it's like a thunder strikes me, I start shivering
because of her

Space has got distorted, I have always admired
the street that is melting 
underneath her

I allowed all and everything, it costed me a lot
I would even shed a tear now
for her

For a long time I have been dreaming like that, and waking up from the nightmares
and wolves were howling 
for her

I am erasing her marks
For her I am destroying cities
After her I am chasing the devils
For her, for her, for her

All in all I have become hopeless
Neither did I know, nor did I see
what happened there
with her

I have survived the hell, I have been through a horrible trauma
and again I would, or would I? (be)
with her

:-)
